STRINGS.STRING: This feature allows the user to clean the Aftertreatment Particulate Matter Sensor of soot.

Initial Conditions 1. Engine running Steps 1. Select Start Additional Information 1. This feature will activate a heater on the particulate matter sensor for approximately 30 seconds to 1 minute to clean the sensor of soot 2. The regeneration will fail to run if: a. The exhaust flow is too low b. The exhaust temperature is too low c. The operation is prohibited by the ECM d. The engine is stopped e. An ECM Fault becomes active
This feature is not supported by the current calibration.
The regeneration could not run because the engine is stopped.
The regeneration can not run due to low exhaust flow.
The regeneration can not run due to low exhaust temperature.
The ECM has detected a fault condition. Check for active faults.
The ECM detects a condition in which the regeneration cannot be run.
The ECM detects a condition in which the regeneration cannot be run.
Please wait while INSITE resets the Knock Derate.
The ECM detects a condition in which the regeneration cannot be run.

<ErrorInfo><ErrorNumber>404000</ErrorNumber><Description>INSITE can not read the ECM parameters when connected to the ECM. Please contact technical support.</Description><Suggestion>Check if the parameter(s) is supported in the calibration.</Suggestion></ErrorInfo>
